original: Hörsne, Mats, advokat, Kalmar, f. 13/1/97 i Hörsne m. Bara förs., Gotl. 1., av kontr :prost Sigge Jacobson o. Mathilda Nyström. G, 31 m. Elsa Stephani. Barn: Ulf f. 37. — Stud:-ex. i Visby 16, jur. kand. i Upps. 28. Tingstjg. i S. Roslags samt i Gotl n. doms. 28-30, tjg. i Svea hovr. 31, egen adv:rör. i Kalmar sed. 31. Led. av Sv :e s adv: s amf. 36.
translated: Hörsne, Mats, lawyer, Kalmar, b. 13/1/97 in Hörsne with Bara parish, Gotland. Son of district pastor Sigge Jacobsson and Mathilda Nyström. Married to Elsa Stephani in 1931. Children: Ulf, b. 1937. Studied at Visby high school, graduated in 1916. Graduated with a law degree from Uppsala University in 1928. Served as a court clerk in South Roslagen and Gotland from 1928-1930, served as a court clerk in Svea Court of Appeals in 1931, established own law firm in Kalmar in 1931. Member of the Swedish Bar Association from 1936 onwards.
